court_orders.title: Delhi High Court Order - Free Treatment for LSDs
court_orders.summary: The High Court directed AIIMS to provide free enzyme replacement therapy to children with Gaucher disease.

court_orders.title: Karnataka High Court Judgment on Rare Diseases
court_orders.summary: Direction to the state government to allocate a specific budget for the treatment of rare disease patients.

court_orders.title: Kerala High Court Directive
court_orders.summary: Mandate for the formation of a state-level committee to oversee the disbursement of crowdfunding for rare diseases.
